title: Oceanic Artathon Round Two - Sponsored by Wacom and SMASH!

replies.body: Hey! Are you guys be able to send me an email? Because I forgot which email address did I use for the first round.ðŸ˜…(summoner name: Pokerface)
I'm in your inbox RIGHT NOW. >:D
I was unable to enter for the first round but am considering have a go at the remaining rounds. Does this make me ineligible for the competition?

Hey Six! You're not ineligible for the competition but the final top 10 will be determined by the aggregate highest-voted across all three. So for example if you smash round 2 and 3 out of the park, you could definitely still be up there - but your 'score' to reach that final top 10 will be competing with artists who entered all three rounds.

Hope this makes sense - let me know if not! I'd definitely love to see your work. :D
that kinda sucks for me I'm a beginner artist and didn't enter the first one because of my broken hand XD but I will still try!
Achenar is there any way I can get in contact with you personally ? I want to ask a question specifically about an idea I have

I am in a similar boat. I half finished my Ionia piece but was unable to meet the deadline due to medical reasons. I cried for a whole day, was so keen on the artist's booth. I am glad I can still enter the others.

yep def going to put forward art for the next 2, but because its a small chance of winning just going to do it for fun, maby you will get better art because of that. You wont because I do most my art in vector because I like the challenge but MAYBE

I just realised that one of my layers in my picture isnt showing, I sent in a support ticket with my fixed image, Is there a way you can swap them? It really makes the picture look unfinished and i cant  resubmit it myself because it just takes me to the link of my already done picture! Please get back to me! I am boarderline freaking out
Hey! If you can resubmit using another email address, I'll manually swap the entries out - that'll make sure it gets through to me before closing time. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=o3loqBJ7,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-05-27T09:43:34.549+0000)
>
> Hey! If you can resubmit using another email address, I'll manually swap the entries out - that'll make sure it gets through to me before closing time. :)

when i click the submit entry link it just takes me to my woobox link, i can submit it on another account and just use this accounts sum name?
I managed to resubmit it on this account, but I still put LÃ«ona was taken for the sum name and used a different email address, Hopefully did this in time for it to be fixed! Thanks :)

Just to make sure 100% cause I had to start my entry late, it ends on Sunday at 11.59pm right.. So around 9-10pm for Perth? 
I've hardly slept idk why i need to ask this but here i am LOL 
(im sorry this is a dumb question)
My Googlefu (because I'm terrible at timezones) says 9:59PM Perth time. :D

oh my, I forgot I even commented that LOL. I just submitted my entry, i cut it close this time with the deadline. Will just make sure you guys got the entry on your end. 


tastes like purple!

Hey! So ive submitted my picture but in the woobox link it looks like its cropped on the sides,  im jsut wondering what size the picture should be just incase i need to resubmit it?
Thanks {{champion:89}}
There aren't any particular size restrictions on the art - so any cropping might be a weird Woobox quirk. When I open your submission it's 1366x768 - does that sound right to you?

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=o3loqBJ7,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2018-05-27T02:57:12.165+0000)
>
> There aren't any particular size restrictions on the art - so any cropping might be a weird Woobox quirk. When I open your submission it's 1366x768 - does that sound right to you?

yeah! thanks!
Heyo, I just entered a piece for this gauntlet of the competition. Just wanted to check if it got through, 'cause last time my work wasn't displayed on the voting page. Thanks!
Hey Yurito! We've got your entry safe and sound. :)
Can the submitted artwork be animated in anyway? like submitting .movs and such?
Hi! I'm just wondering when the top 50 for last round will be announced? It says that it will be announced today but I can't see anything about it anywhere.
Hey! The top 10 and top 50 were announced yesterday over [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/iEurbe1x-oceanic-artathon-round-one-results). Thanks for checking in! :)
For the lp boiii. Didnt even know this was a thing ;p. I wish everyone gl XD.
Can we paint yordles in skins? Even if the skin is actually not existed? Like can we make up skin for the yordles just to fit the theme/mood of the painting?
Hey! Skins or alternate designs are fine, as long as they're ultimately recognisable as that character. :D
Thank you! Also, can you include a non-yordle champion in the painting? I mean there are some skin lines that have both yordles and other types too. Just clarifying for a friend :)

As long as it's yordle centric. So for example if you did the Star Guardian skin line, but Lulu or Poppy were just hanging out in the background, that more than likely wouldn't qualify. But if Lulu and/or Poppy were front and centre (even if it was an interaction between say Lulu and Jinx) you're all good.
Thank you very much!
I have submitted mine woot! now I can worry about other things, btw mine has something to do with {{champion:18}} good luck everyone else <3.
For this round, do the yordles have to be chilling and sipping tea, or it can be a full on battle brawl?
Yordles are versatile little buddies! They could be doing aaaaaaaanything...within the boundaries of that M rating. ;)
Hey dude! I assume you mean for round one - but I don't have any entry for you in the system, assuming you submitted with this summoner name. D:

HI Achenar, I submitted my artwork under the username "ExterminatorFuzi" which was a picture about kayn killing sion. I double checked I submitted it, and the page even came up which said that my work had been submitted. I can't find it anywhere on the voting boards. Why is this? Can you help me understand the problem please?  I spent 5-6 hours drawing this so I'm pretty gutted.

Hey guys, I HAVE found Exterminator's entry in the system - however it's not displaying in the gallery as it's a PDF, not an image file.

I'm a little confused as to why a PDF would be accepted in this scenario, since it was specifically an image contest, and I'm trying to figure out how to fix it - watch this space. I'm so sorry this has happened!

Hi Can u tell me what file type to send in in? I am sending it from procreate and I didn't know what the file type meant so it may be my fault. If you give me a link or something I can resubmit. I will do anything, I spent way too much time on this to miss out. THANKS

Hey, so entries SHOULD be an image file type (like PNG, JPG, JPEG, etc.) rather than a document type like PDF. That said, the system shouldn't have accepted a PDF if it wasn't going to display for voting - so that's still a mess-up on our side and I'm super sorry!

All that said - I've fixed your entry up manually so it's now displaying properly in the voting gallery. I've also sent you a little apology gift - sorry this was a mess! :(
THANKYOU SO MUCH MAN! WHAT A LIFESAVER!
The same thing happened to my brother, using the account ExterminatorFuzi. is the system bugged?

HI Achenar, I submitted my artwork under the username "ExterminatorFuzi" which was a picture about kayn killing sion. I double checked I submitted it, and the page even came up which said that my work had been submitted. I can't find it anywhere on the voting boards. Why is this? Can you help me understand the problem please? I spent 5-6 hours drawing this so I'm pretty gutted.
